resources.string: Communication with this website is not encrypted. This allows third parties to intercept information, track your browsing, and inject malicious content.
Content URLs are data loaded from other apps on your device.
The certificate start date is in the future
The Common Name does not match the hostname
The certificate authority is not trusted
The date on the certificate is invalid
The system cannot detect a compatible file manager.
The file is an MHT web archive.
Sometimes MIME Encapsulated HTML (MHT) web archives need to be manually specified to be opened correctly.
audeon browser cannot currently download blob URLs.
Android’s download manager cannot handle data URLs.

Because Android’s WebView does not expose the source information, a separate request was made using system tools to gather the information displayed in this activity. There may be some differences between this data and that used by the WebView in the main activity. This limitation will be removed in the 4.x series with the release of Privacy WebView.
An SVG cannot currently be used as a bookmark favorite icon.
A bookmark cannot be deselected while the parent folder is selected.
Third-party domain regular expression block list
*. may be prepended to a domain to include all subdomains (eg. *.stoutner.com)
Load an encrypted website before opening Domain Settings to populate the current website SSL certificate.
OpenPGP encryption requires that OpenKeychain be installed.
The unencrypted file will have to be imported in a separate step after it is decrypted.
Proxying through Orbot will not work unless the Orbot app is installed.
Proxying through I2P will not work unless the I2P app is installed.
The custom proxy URL is invalid.
JavaScript allows websites to run programs (scripts) on the device.
Cookies are an app level setting. When the active tab has cookies enabled, any network request made in the background by another tab also has cookies enabled.
JavaScript must be enabled for Document Object Model storage to function.

resources.string: Clear the history and cache after each webpage finishes loading. In Incognito Mode, back closes the tab (or the app if there is only one tab).
Allow screenshots, video recording, and viewing on non-secure displays. Changing this setting will restart audeon browser.
Filter annoying popups and links. Includes Fanboy’s social blocking lists.
UltraList filters ads that EasyList doesn’t because doing so can break websites.
UltraPrivacy filters trackers that EasyPrivacy doesn’t because doing so can break websites.
Blocking all third-party requests increases privacy, but it breaks many websites.
Remove known tracking queries from URLs.
Remove known AMP (Accelerated Mobil Pages) redirect queries from URLs.
None - connect directly to the internet.
Double-tap to toggle full screen browsing mode.
Hide the app bar that contains the URL.
Draw the website under cutouts, like camera notches. When this is enabled, audeon browser will also be drawn under the keyboard. Changing this setting will restart audeon browser on Android < 15.
Clears cookies, DOM storage, the logcat, and WebView’s cache. Then manually deletes the entire “app_webview” and “cache” directories.
Intents are links sent from other apps.
Some websites don’t work well if swipe to refresh is enabled.
audeon browser - audeon browser’s built-in downloader is simple, but it has the advantage of honoring the proxy and using cookies (if enabled), as well as being able to save data: URLs.

Android download manager - Android’s download manager does not honor audeon browser’s proxy settings, but it does have access to cookies (meaning that files downloaded from sites that require a login will probably work).

External app - External apps do not honor audeon browser’s proxy settings and do not have access to cookies (meaning that it is unlikely that files downloaded from sites that require a login will work).
Scroll the app bar off the top of the screen when the WebView scrolls down.
Move the app bar to the bottom of the screen. Changing this setting will restart audeon browser.
Display icons in the app bar for refreshing the WebView and, if there is room, for opening the bookmarks drawer and toggling cookies. Changing this setting will restart audeon browser.
Sort the bookmarks alphabetically, with the folders displayed above the bookmarks. This disables manual ordering of bookmarks.
Using a wide viewport makes some webpages layout more like the desktop site.
ID not valid. Use patterns Profil-[a-z0-9_-] (≤32).
